title: BitSler support
author: BitSler support
created_time: June 28, 2023, 02:14:11 PMLast edit: July 04, 2023, 03:07:18 PM by BitSler support
content: Bitsler.com $10 No Deposit BonusExclusive To All Pinoy Players OnlyWHO WE ARESince 2015,  Bitsler  has been one of the most popular cryptocurrency casinos in the market, offering a range of options from casino games to sportsbook with competitive odds and fast transfers. We have over 4000 games, including classics such as dice, roulette, crash, blackjack, and slot machines, as well as a wide selection of esports matches and sports events to bet on.RULES‣ Promotion Duration: This campaign will take place from June 28st at 14:00 UTC to July 9th at 23:59 UTC;‣ The specified amount will be credited to the new player's account upon registration*. This credited amount must be exclusively utilized for placing bets on the Dota2 Bali Major event and will only be credited to players from the Philippines;‣ Bitsler reserves the right to withhold fund credits or confiscate previously credited funds in cases of suspicious or fraudulent activity;‣ General Terms and Conditions apply. We reserve the right to suspend and/or terminate your account, cancel any outstanding bets or bonuses, withhold payment of your winnings, and/or confiscate any and all funds in your account at our sole discretion if any of the provisions in the terms and conditions are found to have been violated;‣ Completion of the KYC verification process is mandatory before the balance can be credited.

comments.author: jamyr
comments.body: Thanks to those who signed up and conpleted the registration process. Hanggang july 9 pa po habol na ung wala pang bitsler account. Oo nga pala once u place the 10 dollar sa bali major, ur automatically eligible for This ongoing promotionhttps://www.bitsler.com/en/promotions/dota-2-bali-betting-promo#QuotePlace a bet of at least $10 on any match in the competition and we will grant you a $5 free bet which you can use on anywhere on Bitsler after the Bali final.
